author: senh
title: These are the best coworking destinations now that summer is over
text: BING NEWS: Why “Coworking-vacation” is wrong Co-workation, they say, is when coworking and vacation meet. It’s when people go to Bali or the Canary Islands or any other postcard destinations, and work with like-minded people in a coworking space at day, and have fun at night. Excerpt from Liza ... 09/21/2015 - 2:05 pm | View Link Bespoke Coworking, Event and Tech Demo Ecosystem Launches at Westfield San Francisco Centre Fully customizable digital walls and a high-tech, high-touch environment opens doors for unique product demonstrations, beta testing and market research in one of the most heavily trafficked destinations in the city, attracting the most tech-savvy ... 05/28/2015 - 4:36 am | View Link Road Warrior Voices' guide to coworking vacations USA TODAY Travel's Road Warrior Voices is a leading source of practical information and advice for digital nomads and Road Warriors who would like turn their business trips into coworking vacations. Find tips on everything from how to convince your boss to ... 05/26/2015 - 1:00 pm | View Link Coworking kitchen for food artisans opening in Oakland "It is quickly becoming one of the premier destinations for food entrepreneurs. I love the diversity of the people, culture and community here and that diversity is reflected by the wide variety of artisans that are popping up all over Oakland." Dessert ... 04/8/2015 - 4:28 pm | View Link The best (and cheapest) places in the world for coworking At the rooftop of B Amsterdam, a coworking space located in the former IBM headquarters, members grow their own food on this roof garden.
